name: Pizza Rush Race: Fighting Boss
summary:
Pizza boss - Peppino is very angry, rushing to fight with Tomato but encountering a maze of trouble, are you smart enough to solve this situation?

In the Pizza Town Race, you need to help Pepperman, Peppino... find Tomata of the same color in the shortest time, before the Pizza boss's anger erupts. Challenges, obstacles, obstacles will constantly appear to challenge your imagination and puzzle ability.
